entry.name: MAV_STATE_CALIBRATING
entry.description: System is calibrating and not flight-ready.

entry.name: MAV_STATE_STANDBY
entry.description: System is grounded and on standby. It can be launched any time.

entry.name: MAV_STATE_ACTIVE
entry.description: System is active and might be already airborne. Motors are engaged.

entry.name: MAV_STATE_CRITICAL
entry.description: System is in a non-normal flight mode. It can however still navigate.

entry.name: MAV_STATE_EMERGENCY
entry.description: System is in a non-normal flight mode. It lost control over parts or over the whole airframe. It is in mayday and going down.

entry.name: MAV_STATE_POWEROFF
entry.description: System just initialized its power-down sequence, will shut down now.

entry.name: MSG_STATUS_ERR_CRC
entry.description: Message CRC did not match. Possibly resend message.

entry.name: MSG_STATUS_ERR_MSG_ID
entry.description: The remote system did not know how to handle the message ID.

entry.name: MSG_STATUS_ERR_BUFFER_FULL
entry.description: The remote system's input buffer was full, and the message could not be accepted.

entry.name: MSG_STATUS_ERR_INVALID_PARAM
entry.description: One of the parameters could not be accepted.

entry.name: NAV_MODE_MANUAL
entry.description: System is under manual human control.

entry.name: NAV_MODE_AUTO
entry.description: System is under autopilot control, with no autoguidance. The vehicle will basically fly a straight line to a designated point.

entry.name: NAV_MODE_AUTO_WAYPOINTS
entry.description: System is under autopilot control, with autoguidance. The vehicle will fly a series of waypoints.

entry.name: NAV_STATUS_ERR_WAYPOINTS_FULL
entry.description: The previous waypoint could not be added because the waypoint buffer is full.

entry.name: NAV_STATUS_ERR_WAYPOINTS_EMPTY
entry.description: The navigation system cannot function because it has no waypoints.

message.name: HEARTBEAT
message.description: The heartbeat message shows that a system is present and responding.
message.field: System status flag, see MAV_STATE ENUM
System status flag, see NAV_MODE ENUM

message.name: INVALID_MSG
message.description: The message was received, but could not be accepted.
message.field: The error that occured. See MSG_STATUS enum.

message.name: NAV_STATUS
message.description: A status message from the onboard navigation system.
message.field: The status message. See NAV_STATUS enum.

message.name: NAV_SET_MODE
message.field: The navigation mode. See NAV_MODE enum.

message.name: NAV_SET_DESTINATION
message.description: Commands the vehicle to fly to a specific destination immediately.

message.name: NAV_WAYPOINTS_PUSH
message.description: Pushes a new waypoint to the end of the vehicle's queue.

message.name: NAV_WAYPOINTS_POP
message.description: Removes the first (current) waypoint in the queue. Vehicle will proceed to next waypoint.

message.name: NAV_WAYPOINTS_CLEAR
message.description: Clears all waypoints from the vehicle.

message.name: TELEMETRY_ALL
message.description: Receives all telemetry data from sensor board

message.name: TELEMETRY_DEBUG
message.description: Contains debug data from many sensors as well as system statuses

message.name: DEBUG_UINT8
message.description: Receive a uint8_t from the plane.

message.name: DEBUG_UINT16
message.description: Receive a uint16_t from the plane.

message.name: TEST_LED
message.description: Turns an LED on or off.
